$45m security spend: Woolworths roll out body cameras for staff as after assaults, abuse on staff skyrockets https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/security-beefed-up-woolworths-rolls-out-body-cameras-for-supermarket-staff-as-assaults-rise/5SIOOXDFP5GC3JAWPHDKXEL3BA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/security-beefed-up-woolworths-rolls-out-body-cameras-for-supermarket-staff-as-assaults-rise/5SIOOXDFP5GC3JAWPHDKXEL3BA/ The rollout is part of Woolworths’ three year, $45 million programme to add more security. Mon, 22 Apr 2024 00:43:47 +0000 Woolworths is rolling out body cameras at all its 191 stores this week, as part of staff safety measures.
